name: desert walking
description:
an endless runner, at your own pace.

dev notes:

I had a lot of fun making this one. I was pretty busy during development so I kept my scope pretty small. Still, I find it relaxing. It's also given me plenty of ideas for future possible updates. Anyway, I hope you enjoy walking through the desert!
